Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Rosecrest Street, running parallel to the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: Rosecrest Street takes a turn either towards the southwest or the northeast, depending on your orientation. Going south it travels parallel to the City Wall, which protects the city from the coastline of the Respitial Sea. To the southeast is an impressive building that was built in memory of one of early peacekeepers in the city. The building is dedicated to Sir Millwood of Uxtiva, and is now the residence of the present Mayor.
